Job_Title: Assistant Manager - Professional Exhibition Organizer (Work at ICC Hatyai) -...
Job_Description: Responsibilities: Take charge of the project assigned by Project Manager from the beginning to the end Able to initiate new project and be creative and apply it to work. Project budget, manage & lead team to successfully achieve the business objective and goal Collaborate with all concerned departments and customers to facilitate event projects both local and international Negotiate with organizers, exhibitors and suppliers in any related matters Approach customers by telephone call, email or visit to discuss on project management and requirements for event or party launching Present event concept to customers and ensure customers’ satisfaction Maintain good relationship with customers and establish new business prospects Other tasks assigned by superior Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in any related fields At least 4-5 years relevant working experience in exhibition, event, seminar, conference organizer / project management Knowledgeable in PR, Media & Marketing such as Social Media/ Digital Channels Strong leadership skill. able to provide necessary guidance and consultation to sales team members Service minded, dynamic with high level of initiative and creativity, able to work under pressure Good command of English both verbal and written Good interpersonal and coordinating skills Highly responsible, patient and able to meet with strict deadlines Human Resources Department N.C.C. Management & Development Co., Ltd. 60 Queen Sirikit National Convention Center, Ratchadaphisek Road, Khlong Toei Sub-district, Khlong Toei District, Bangkok TEL. 02-229-3610 Website: www.qsncc.com Only short-listed candidate will be notified.

Job_Title: Ticketing Officer/พนักงานจำหน่ายตั๋วเครื่องบิน
Company: Siam Express Travel Services Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: จองตั๋วและออกตั๋วเครื่องบินทั้งในประเทศและต่างประเทศให้กับลูกค้า Corporate แนะนำเส้นทางการบินให้กับลูกค้า Corporate แนะนำและจองโรงแรมให้กับลูกค้า Corporate

Job_Title: Head Barista / Bar/หัวหน้างานบาริสต้า / บาร์
Job_Description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ มีความรู้และทักษะในงานบาริสต้า / บาร์เทนเดอร์ มีบุคลิกภาพที่ดีเหมาะกับงาน ชอบงานบริการ มีความรู้ความเข้าใจ เกี่ยวกับประเภทของเครื่องดื่มต่างๆ คิดสูตรเมนูเครื่องดื่ม และออกแบบเครื่องดื่มใหม่ๆ ตามเทศกาล ควบคุมดูแลมาตรฐานของการทำเครื่องดื่มไปจนถึงการตรวจสอบคุณภาพวัตถุดิบ ดูแลและควบคุมการเก็บรักษาวัตถุดิบในการทำเครื่องดื่มและควบคุมต้นทุนค่าใช้จ่าย ดูแลรักษาความสะอาดเรียบร้อยภายในพท.รับผิดชอบ รักษาสภาพอุปกรณ์เครื่องใช้ ให้สะอาด เรียบร้อย และด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงาน ดูแลพนักงานผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาทุกคนรวมถึงการเทรนนิ่งพนักงานใหม่ที่เข้ามาและตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ: ปวส. - ปริญญาตรี มีทักษะในงานบาริสต้า และบาร์เทนเดอร์ มีบุคลิกเหมาะสมและมีความเป็นผู้นำ ประสบการณ์การทำงาน 2-3 ปี สวัสดิการ service charge ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี โบนัสพิเศษประจำปี อาหาร 2 มื้อ ชุดยูนิฟอร์ม วันหยุด 1 วัน

Veranda Resort Group Responsibilities: Understanding the overall sales objectives that have been established by DB in approaching the market. Penetrated the sales plan along with DB for leisure market. Arranged the market planning and account planning system in place. Created the plan to expand the customer based. Identifying and establishing contacts with potential customers proactively. To respond to sales inquiries from new and existing customers. Delivered the hotel’s presentation at customer sites, sales call in order. To advertise the product sales and deliver a detailed account strategy. Provided the feedback of potential customers and to use the strategies to enhance product functioning and service delivery. Ensuring the effective internal communications within the department, among different departments and towards the customers. To introduce the hotel to the market and promote the product and deliver details as per the account strategies. To develop new businesses and generate revenues for the branch as targeted To get new markets and new customers for the hotel. To prepare and manage incoming and outgoing mails and correspondences, including e-mail and faxes. To coordinates clients' schedule and makes appointments for sales visits. Conduct hotel site inspection & FAM Trip if need. Represent Veranda Resort, M-Gallery by Sofitel at relevant functions and events. Analyze the activities of competitor hotels, including their customer base, with the aim of developing and securing new business and providing a market advantage. Prospecting for new business opportunities for the hotel. Qualifying potential customers and for other less potential to become more potential. Making proposals that specifically meet client’s needs. Negotiated deals and to close deals. Overcome clients’ objections, including prices and locations. Present promotional opportunities, new revenue opportunities for the Hotel. Participate in trade shows, conventions and promotional events, within the hotel, the industry and customer organizations; domestic and international. Conduct development and performance reviews, identifying key personnel for further development and proactive structured career outline. Undertake other duties as requested by the DB Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in any related fields Experienced in hotel/resort sales specialized in inbound business Experienced in hotel/resort from Chiang Mai and Pattaya will be more positive Service minded, dynamic and creativity, able to work under pressure Good command of English both verbal and written Good interpersonal and coordinating skills Highly responsible, patient and able to meet with strict deadlines

Job_Title: Project Coordinator/เจ้าหน้าที่ประสานงาน
Job_Description: ลักษณะงาน : งานประจำ รายละเอียดงาน ติดต่อประสานงานกับลูกค้า/ซัพพลายเออร์/โรงแรม/สายการบิน/คนขับรถ/ไกด์ ฯลฯ ทางอีเมล ไลน์และโทรศัพท์ ตรวจสอบ/ติดตามและช่วยสนับสนุนการทำงานของทีมต่างๆ จัดทำงานธุรการ งานเอกสารสำหรับการออกเดินทาง ค่าใช้จ่าย และค่ากิจกรรมทั้งหมด จัดเตรียมข้อมูลรายละเอียดของโปรแกรมทัวร์ที่ได้รับมอบหมายด้วยโปรแกรม Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint ฯลฯ แก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าต่างๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย รับผิดชอบงานด้านอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป (ไม่จำกัดสาขา) มีประสบการณ์ในงานบริหาร งานบริการ หรือ งานประสานงานในสายงานการท่องเที่ยว/เอเจนซี่ทัวร์ อย่างต่ำ 2 ปีขึ้นไป มีความรู้ความสามารถในการใช้โปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์ทั่วไป เช่น Microsoft Office, Internet, Email และอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีความสามารถในการสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษเป็นอย่างดีทั้ง ฟัง-พูด-อ่าน-เขียน (หากสามารถสื่อสารภาษาสเปนได้ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ) ขยัน มีใจรักในงานบริการ มีวินัยในตัวเอง มีความรับผิดชอบต่อหน้าที่ ตรงต่อเวลา มีระเบียบ ทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันได้ดี และมีความอดทนสูง มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์ มีความบุคลิกดี ทัศนคติดี พูดจาชัดเจน เรียนรู้งานไว หากมีประสบการณ์ท่องเที่ยวหลากหลายประเทศ (จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ) หากมีพื้นฐานการบัญชีและจัดทำเอกสาร เช่น ออกใบแจ้งหนี้/ใบเสร็จรับเงิน/ใบกำกับภาษี/เอกสารหัก ณ ที่จ่าย ฯลฯ (จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ) สามารถทำงานล่วงเวลาได้ สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : สำนักงาน(สะพานพระราม 5 สี่แยกบางสีเมือง) - นอกสถานที่ทั้งภายในประเทศและต่างประเทศ สวัสดิการ : ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี ประกันอุบัติเหตุ ประกันภัยการเดินทาง โบนัส วันหยุด 4 - 5 วัน/เดือน (สามารถเลือกวันหยุดเองได้)

Job_Title: Restaurant Manager (Royal Garden Pattaya) salary up to 55K + other benefits
Job_Description: Responsibilities: Contribute and monitor sales to reach the target Work Closely with Service and kitchen team to ensure smooth daily operations Handle dissatisfied internal and external customers Manage and supervise the whole service and kitchen team. Manage sales and customer service. Manage and control cost and build profit to achieve by company targets To run daily operation and solving problem on the customer complain To develop and engage team both head of team and team member Qualifications :- Bachelor's Degree or higher in related fields Pre-Opening knowledge Previous experience of running an outlet for at least 5 years Strong leadership, coaching motivation, interpersonal & coordination, good problem-solving skill and conflict management skill. Good command of English. and computer literacy. Good personality with excellent communication and strong service-minded Please send the resume to : Wine Connection Co., Ltd. 90/9 Sathorn Thani Building 1, 6 Floor, North Sathorn Road, Silom, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 Tel : 02 238 2137 , Fax : 02 238 2138 Website : http://www.wineconnection.com [link removed]

Job_Title: ดูแลผู้สูงอายุ
Job_Description: เป็นบริษัทที่ดูแลผู้สูงอายุ ที่เป็นโรคความจำเสื่อม ผู้สูงอายุเป็นชาวต่างชาติ ผู้สูงอายุมีทั้งเดินได้ และในรถเข็น คุณสมบัติ: มีประสบการณ์การดูแลผู้สูงอายุ จะรับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ผู้สมัครงานต้องจบหลักสูตรผู้ช่วยพยาบาลตามที่รัฐบาล กำหนด 420 ชั่วโมง และ 840 ชั่วโมง สามารถทำงานเป็นกะได้ โทร: 086-9133614 หรือ 085-0366494 โทรสมัครได้ตั้งแต่เวลา 8.00 น. ถึง 17.00 น.

Job_Title: Cluster Finance Manager(Peri Khoyai and Peri Huahin) Base on Bangkok
Job_Description: Responsibilities: Lead and manage the finance teams of both hotels, providing guidance and support to ensure efficient operations and adherence to company policies and procedures. Prepare accurate and timely financial statements, budgets, and forecasts for both hotels, including monthly, quarterly, and annual reporting. Manage cash flow, working capital, and financial resources for both hotels, ensuring optimal liquidity and profitability. Oversee accounts payable and receivable functions, ensuring timely payments and collections. Analyze financial data and identify areas for cost reduction and revenue improvement. Implement and maintain internal controls to safeguard assets and ensure compliance with financial regulations. Partner with hotel management teams to provide financial insight and support strategic decision-making. Manage payroll and benefits administration for both hotels. Oversee IT systems related to finance and accounting functions. Identify and implement new financial technologies and processes to improve efficiency and accuracy. Mentor and develop the finance team members. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field, CPA or equivalent preferred. Minimum 5 years of experience in a financial leadership role within the hospitality industry. Experience managing multiple properties or clusters is highly desirable. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and teamwork skills. Proven ability to manage and motivate employees. Proficient in financial software and systems. Excellent attention to detail and ability to work in a fast-paced environment. Able to travel to work in the provinces.

กลุ่มโรงแรมสปริงฟิลด์ หัวหิน ชะอำ ปฏิบัติงาน ที่ กทม. สีลม อาคารธนิยะ (ภายใต้กลุ่มบริษัทธนิยะ) 1.  อัพเดทข้อมูลทางด้านรายได้ที่เกิดขึ้นในแต่ละวัน 2.  อัพเดทคู่แข่งขันทางการตลาด และแนวโน้มทางการตลาด 3.   ประเมินความต้องการของลูกค้าในแต่ละช่วงระยะเวลาว่าจะมีความต้องการเพิ่มขึ้นในช่วงใด เพื่อนำเสนอ AMD และปรับเปลี่ยนราคาเพื่อเพิ่มยอดขายให้มากขึ้น รายงานผลประกอบการ และกลุ่มลูกค้าที่เคยมาใช้บริการในปีที่ผ่านมาให้กับทีมฝ่ายขาย 5.  ออกเอกสารแจ้ง และกระจายไปยังผู้เกี่ยวข้อง 6.  ประสานงานกับฝ่ายสำรองห้องพักในเรื่องจำนวนห้องว่างที่จะขาย ตรวจเช็ค กรุ๊ป และความคืบหน้าของสถานะว่าจะยืนยัน เปลี่ยนแปลง ยกเลิก เพื่อใช้เป็นการคำนวณรายได้ 8.พร้อมเข้าช่วยแก้ปัญหาอื่นๆ 9. ปฏิบัติหน้าที่อื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชา

Essential Duties and Responsibilities Reports directly to and communicates with the Front Office Manager on all pertinent matters affecting guest service and hotel operations. Provides functional assistance and direction to all departments. Cooperates, coordinates and communicates with other hotel departments as required. Reacts to situations to ensure guests receive prompt attention and personal recognition throughout the hotel. Responds to guest needs and resolves related problems. Supervises and directs Reception and Reservations personnel. Supports and assists Front Office personnel and all departments at peak periods. Ensures VIPs and priority club guests receive special attention. Inspects front of house and back of house regularly for cleanliness. Assists Guest Relations in greeting, rooming, and sending off VIP guests. Monitors appropriate standards of conduct, uniform, hygiene, and appearance of staff. Provides input for Front Office meetings. Promotes inter-hotel sales and in-house facilities. Checks billing instructions and monitors guest credit Analyses and approves discounts and rebates. Analyses the rate variance report to ensure rooms revenue control. Takes action with the Property Management Systems (PMS) in emergency situation. Fully conversant with all hotel emergency procedures. Ensures front line staff complies with FIT marketing techniques and maximize sales. Works with Superior and Human Resources on manpower planning and management needs. Works with Superior and Director of Finance in the preparation and management of the Department’s budget. Required Qualifications Required Skills Communication skills are utilized a significant amount of time when interacting with others; demonstrated ability to interact with customers, employees and third parties that reflects highly on the hotel, the brand and the Company. Good writing skills. Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office and Front Office System. Problem solving and organizational abilities. Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree or Diploma in Hotel Administration, Hotel Management or equivalent. Experience 2 years experience in front office / guest services or related discipline including supervisory experience, or an equivalent combination of education and experience.

Job_Title: Tour Operations Executive (Based in Phuket, Thailand)
Job_Description: About the Opportunity As a member of the Operations team in Phuket, Thailand, the Operations Executive plays a key role to ensure that Discova meets and exceeds its goals and operates successfully. The Operations Executive will work in partnership with Operations Team Leader to execute the operational standards and requirements that will drive customer satisfaction and productivity. This will involve the delivery of best-in-class service and memorable local experiences for the customer. Job Descriptions: Book and operate tours with accuracy within budget. Consistently follow Discova One-Best-Ways (OBWs) processes/procedures/systems across the accounts handled. Make sure to keep strong relationships with suppliers. Effectively cooperate with Tour Guides, Product, Sales, Reservation, Customer Experience, and Suppliers for seamless daily operations and overall service improvements. Solve on the ground situations with initiative within agreed process. Be customer-oriented and help improve satisfaction as well as Net Promoter Score. Requirements: A Bachelor Degree or a degree in tourism and hospitality is an advantage. Experience in a DMC or tour operator is an advantage. Good command of both written and spoken English. An understanding and belief in Responsible Tourism is desirable. Able to work on Wed-Sun (Day off : Mon - Tue). The Attributes: Excellent organizational skills with the ability to be flexible and implement change when needed. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal across a variety of cultures to a diverse range of people (customers, suppliers, team members, leaders). Highly motivated, self-starter prepared to do whatever it takes to succeed High attention to detail. Able to work under pressure and juggle multiple tasks and able to work outside office hours when required. Able to work independently and within a team assisting team members to help everyone achieve results. Personally aligned with Discova’s company purpose and values. About us The Discova brand was launched in July 2019 and is the newest brand in the Flight Centre Travel Group family of brands.  The merger of Buffalo Tours in Asia and Olympus Tours in the Americas created a global DMC business with more than 20 years experience in delivering amazing travel experiences to our customers. With a purpose to connect people and places with a world of possibilities, we are the travel people who work globally, live locally and go the extra mile to help our partners extend their reach. Finally, if you are successful, you will find out that working with Discova is more than just a job. To be part of the Discova family is to be in your element . We offer an exciting career progression globally and a fantastic and supportive team culture and social events that are the envy of the industry. Get in touch now and Discova a world of possibilities!

Job_Title: Assistant Operation SOP Trainer (ผู้ช่วยผู้ฝึกสอน SOP)
Job_Description: Roles & Responsibilities Conduct the SOP Training Plan for employees. Assist the Operation Executive in organizing and delivering various types of training activities for operational purposes. Conduct audits of store outlets to maintain SOP standards, service standard procedures, store wastage control, and operational guidelines. Create and/or acquire training procedure manuals, guides, and course materials aligned with operational performance and employee development. Present training and development programs using diverse formats, including group discussions, lectures, simulations, and videos. Maintain records of training and development activities, attendance, assessment results, Qualification Requirements and retraining requirements. Maintain personal SOP and SSP procedures with 100% accuracy. Able to set an example for employees. Provide assistance on-site with outlet operations when necessary. Collaborate closely with the Area Store Manager and Operations Executive to develop the Company’s SOP, SOC, SSP, and work structure that aligns with the company’s brand image and customer expectations. Assist the Operations Executive in processing outlet licenses or any related documents as required. Update the SOP Training report on a weekly and monthly basis. Oversee the POS and Delivery platform setting to be aligned with operation requirements. Any other tasks assigned by the Direct Manager. Qualification Requirements Positive attitude and good collaboration. Able to work under pressure. Business Oriented& Understand the Business model. At least 1 years of Training and Coaching experience. Good team player and effective communication abilities. Service-Minded. Self-Motivation. Education Background & Skill Requirements A Bachelor’s Degree in any related field. Computer Basic Skills such as Microsoft Programs. Training and Coaching Skills. Logical Thinking and Problem-Solving. Good Teamwork & Inter-Personal Skills. Strong negotiation and communication skills. Multitasking and Management Skills. Time Management Good command of the Chinese and English language will be an advantage.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities Familiarizes and enforces the IHG HR framework including systems of : - Interviewing and Recruitment - Induction and orientation - Training and Development - Performance Appraisal - Employee Administration - Succession Familiarizes and enforces local HR policies and procedures. Liaises with individuals outside the hotel including, but not limited to, employee benefits representatives, attorneys, applicants, government officials, colleges and universities, competitors and other members of the local community. Manages Human Resource Department, ensuring compliance with all Corporate, area and hotel policies and procedures; and current local and government regulations pertaining to employment practices. Assists the Human Resource Director, where appropriate, in the development and preparation of the Hotel’s Strategic Plan, Marketing Plan and Goals Program. Ensures clear lines of communication exist to disseminate information affecting employer - employee relations, employee activities and hotel policies and programs. Prepares and submits periodic reports for management’s use in accordance with Corporate and government requirements, such as turnover reports, personnel inventories, absenteeism reports, health and safety, accident reports etc. Maintains and updates files on employee records, legal documents and other Personnel matters, efficiently and confidentiality. Maintains effective communications at all levels of management and staff. Assists in maintaining and creating a positive atmosphere within the hotel that allows for open two way communication that ensures morale and productivity reach the highest possible levels. Develops and implements recruiting and screening systems and procedures in order to attract qualified candidates for position vacancies. Ensures all new employees attend the hotel’s Orientation Program in accordance with ICHG guidelines. Monitors the administration of the Performance Appraisal Program and acts in an advisory capacity to hotel department heads on the process. Participates in the ICHG Management Development and Succession Planning process by recommending candidates as appropriate. Regularly analyses hotel manpower requirements and recommends selection and development activities to meet those requirements. Contributes to the development and implementation of improved methods of work and better utilization of staff in all areas. Counsels hotel personnel as needed in areas such as career planning, training and development, employee\personal relations and legal issues related to personnel. Ensures applicable laws, regulations, IHG policies and procedures, and union agreements are followed in relation to Grievance and Disciplinary procedures. Consults with department heads on appropriate actions and recommends to management final action to be taken. Implements and monitors an effective employee relations and welfare program in the hotel. Participates in developing and implementing program to ensure employee security and safety. Ensures all staff facilities are maintained in good order and meet hotel’s cleanliness standards. Deals with all problems relating to individuals in an understanding, caring and confidential manner. Ensures all staff are aware of company benefits and make these available. Reviews hotel benefits and compensation levels in comparison with service sector competitors and makes recommendations to ensure the hotel remains competitive within the local employment market as appropriate. Monitors present and future trends, practices and systems in the personnel field and makes recommendations as appropriate. Serves as a member of the Union negotiating team and actively participates in the establishment of Union agreements. Oversees the implementation and administration of Union agreements. Maintains control of Pension plans and safeguards both Company and staff interests. Ensures that all Government Regulations are adhered to. Maintains hotel Disciplinary Procedures, conducts disciplinary meetings and completes the necessary documentation as necessary. Ensures that all staff abide by the hotel dress codes and hotel rules. Contributes towards regional activities as directed. Works with Superior  in the preparation and management of the Department’s budget. REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS Required Skills Communication skills are utilized a significant amount of time when interacting with others; demonstrated ability to interact with customers, employees and third parties that reflects highly on the hotel, the brand and the Company. Knowledge of Local Labour and Employment Regulations. Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office. Problem solving, analytical, reasoning, motivating, organizational and training abilities. Good writing skills. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or Diploma in Human Resources or Business Administration. Experience 3 years of relevant experience or similar supervisory role, or an equivalent combination of education and work-related experience.

Job_Title: Purchasing Account Manager/ผู้จัดการบัญชีจัดซื้อ

Customer Care supervisor – ICS Thailand Job Description The Customer Care Supervisor is part of the Operations team at ICS Thailand. The Customer Care supervisor prepares pre-trip documentation, handles communication with customers on the ground, and reports to agents when required. We are looking for a talented, energetic, results-oriented person who loves working in a fast-paced environment. Reporting to: Central Operations Manager / General Manager Key Responsibilities: Handle ICS Thailand Central emergency phone (primary line) on rotating basis and coordinate emergencies with local offices (North and South) Solve on the ground situations for our clients with initiative within agreed process Handle ICS Customer Care email and communicate with agents when required Arrange welcome / farewell calls for VIP customers Manage call log reports on daily basis Make periodic customer service reports by analyzing tour, call log and complaints & refund reports Manage documentation (welcome packs), welcome gifts and welcome calls for high end customers Supports Central Operations Manager in preparing budget & payment vouchers for guide What we’re looking for: Bachelor degree, preferably in Tourism or Business At least 5 years working experience in Operations in Thailand Fluent in English, a second language is an advantage Proven excellence in a cross-cultural work environment Excellent time management and multi-tasking skills Excellent personal and interpersonal skills Positive attitude and sincere desire to lead by supporting others and open to continuous improvement Able to work on rotational shift including Public Holidays & weekends Responsible team player who can also thrive working independently What we offer: Full time, 5 days a week, results oriented position. At times, deadlines and time zones may dictate outside office hours work as part of this pivotal position Based at our Bangkok office Negotiable salary depending on experience 15 holidays per year, additional days for each year of employment Annual discretionary bonus

Job_Title: Director of Sales/ผู้อำนวยการฝ่ายการขาย
Company: Royal Orchid Hotel (Thailand) Public Company Limited
Job_Description: JOB SUMMARY Assists in leading the property’s segmented sales effort (e.g., group, transient, association, corporate, etc.) and assists in the implementation of the segment sales strategy and achieving segment revenue goals, property revenue goals and guest and employee satisfaction. Conducts all day-to-day activities related to the sales function with a focus on building long-term, value-based customer relationships that enable achievement of property sales objectives. Achieves personal booking goals. CANDIDATE PROFILE Education and Experience • 2-year degree from an accredited university in Business Administration, Marketing, Hotel and Restaurant Management, or related major; 3 years experience in the sales and marketing or related professional area. OR • 4-year bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Hotel and Restaurant Management, or related major; 1 year experience in the sales and marketing or related professional area. CORE WORK ACTIVITIES Developing & Executing Sales Strategies • Works with sales leader to ensure understanding of sales strategy and effective implementation of this strategy for the segment. • Assists in the development, implementation and sustaining of aggressive solicitation program focused on increasing business. • Works with management team to create and implement a sales plan addressing revenue, customers and the market for the segment led by the DOS. • Assists with the development and implementation of promotions, both internal and external. Maximizing Revenue • Provides positive and aggressive leadership to ensure maximum revenue potential (e.g., sets example with personal booking goals). • Recommends booking goals for sales team members. Managing Sales Activities • Approves space release for catering to maximize revenue (DOS, Group) in the absence of a Business Evaluation Manager. • Participates in sales calls with members of sales team to acquire new business and/or close on business. • Executes and supports the operational aspects of business booked (e.g., generating proposal, writing contract, customer correspondence). Analyzing & Reporting on Sales and Financial Data • Analyzes market information by using sales systems and implements strategy to achieve property’s financial room and catering goals. • Assists Revenue Management with completing accurate six period projections. • Reviews sales and catering guest satisfaction results to identify areas of improvement. Ensuring Exceptional Customer Service • Displays leadership in guest hospitality, exemplifies customer service and creates a positive example for guest relations. • Interacts with guests to obtain feedback on product quality and service levels. • Meets with guests during pre- and post-convention meetings to obtain feedback on quality of product (e.g., rooms, meeting facilities and equipment, food and beverage), service levels, execution against contract and overall satisfaction. • Empowers employees to provide excellent customer service. • Observes service behaviors of employees and provides feedback to individuals and/or managers. • Incorporates guest satisfaction as a component of department meetings with a focus on continuous improvement. • Ensures that a customer recognition program is in effect throughout Sales. • Executes and supports the company’s Customer Service Standards and property’s Brand Standards. • Participates in and practices daily service basics of the brand. • Executes exemplary customer service to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty by assisting the customer and ensuring their satisfaction before and during their program/event. • Serves the customer by understanding their needs and recommending the appropriate features and services that best meet their needs and exceed their expectations, while building a relationship and loyalty to the company. • Gains understanding of the property’s primary target customer and service expectations; serves the customer by understanding their business, business issues and concerns, to offer better business solution both prior to, and during the program/event. Building Successful Relationships • Develops and manages relationships with key stakeholders, both internal and external. • Works collaboratively with off-property sales channels (e.g., Event Booking Center, Market Sales, GSO) to ensure the property needs are being achieved and the sales efforts are complementary, not duplicative. • Works with Human Resources, Engineering and Loss Prevention to ensure compliance with local, state and federal regulations and/or union requirements. • Attends customer events, trade shows and sales missions to maintain, build or develop key relationships with GSO Managers and customers.

Job_Title: นักจิตวิทยา ครูพิเศษ
Company: TEACHER AOR DEVELOPMENT HOUSE COMPANY LIMITED
Job_Description: รายละเอียดงาน ฝึกและประกบเด็กพิเศษ คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร ปริญญาตรีจิตวิทยา ชายผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหารแล้ว รักเด็ก วุฒิการศึกษา เฉพาะทาง ที่ดูแลเด็กพิเศษ ควบคุมอารมณ์ได้ดี สวัสดิการ เงินเดือน ประกันสังคม รายได้อื่นๆ ตามตำแหน่ง ติดต่อ คุณ Khun Nonglak

Inbound Operation Team Lead Location : Samutprakarn Salary: Up to THB 70,000 As the Inbound Operation Team Lead, you will be responsible for overseeing and managing the inbound operations of our retail business, focusing on Goods Receiving, Goods Return, and Value-Added Services (VAS). You will lead a team responsible for efficiently handling incoming goods, managing returns, and implementing value-added services. Your role involves supervising team members, optimizing processes, and maintaining high standards of quality and accuracy in inbound operations. Responsibilities: Lead and supervise a team of inbound operation associates, providing guidance, support, and training to ensure their effectiveness and productivity. Continuously review and enhance inbound processes related to Goods Receiving, Goods Return, and VAS to maximize efficiency, reduce errors, and meet/exceed performance metrics. Oversee the efficient receiving, inspection, and recording of incoming goods, ensuring accuracy and proper documentation. Supervise the handling of product returns, managing the process efficiently to ensure proper documentation, restocking, or disposal as per company policies. Implement and manage value-added services such as product assembly, labeling, or customization, ensuring accuracy and timely delivery of services. Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, such as purchasing, logistics, and sales, to ensure smooth inbound operations and address issues promptly. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Logistics, or a related field (or equivalent experience). Proven experience in inbound operations, specifically in Goods Receiving, Goods Return, and VAS, preferably in a retail, e-commerce or 3PL environment, with a track record of leadership and team management. Effective communication and interpersonal abilities to lead and collaborate with diverse teams. Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

Travel Consultant: (DMC experience is preferred) Daily communicate with designated source markets (mostly from Europe) Design travel packages for FIT and GIT for holiday and business purposes Provides consultancies and recommendations to clients for the best designed travel itineraries Quotes the packages base on the best value options available or client’s preferences Increase revenue for the company Work on travel system (TourPlan) for database, cost, invoices including the payments Make bookings according to the final travel plan such as accommodation, suppliers, meals, flights and other related activities Coordinate with Operation Department for the ground arrangements and requirements Travel out of the office for products inspections Other ad-hoc task assigned manager

หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ดูแลให้พนักงานทุกคนในหน่วยงานปฏิบัติงานตามนโยบายของโรงแรม วางและกำหนดมาตราฐานในการบริการของห้องอาหาร จัดการหน้าที่การปฏิบัติงาน แนะนำ และดูแลพนักงาน ติดตามการดำเนินงานของพนักงานให้เสร็จเรียบร้อย ดูแลเครื่องใช้ อุปกรณ์ และพื้นที่บริเวณห้องอาหาร ให้มีความสะอาดเรียบร้อยตามมาตรฐานที่กำหนด วางแผนเรื่องบุคลากรในการให้บริการ วางแผนตารางเวลาทำงานของพนักงาน ควบคุมค่าใช้จ่ายของหน่วยงาน รายรับ รายจ่าย โดยยึดงบประมาณการดำเนินการของแผนกอย่างเคร่งครัด ตรวจสอบมาตรฐานการทำงานและดูแลเครื่องแต่งกายและความสะอาดเรียบร้อยของพนักงาน จัดการการฝึกอบรมที่จำเป็นแก่พนักงาน เพื่อให้แน่ใจว่าพนักงานมีทักษะที่จำเป็น และมีความรู้ความชำนาญงาน เพื่อที่จะนำไปใช้ในการปฏิบัติหน้าที่ให้มีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด สร้างความพึงพอใจ รับและดำเนินการข้อร้องเรียนของลูกค้าที่เข้ามาใช้บริการห้องอาหาร คุณสมบัติ วุฒิปวส.ขึ้นไป สาขาการท่องเที่ยวและการโรงแรม หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ด้านห้องอาหาร การบริการลูกค้า 5 ปีขึ้นไป มีทักษะทางด้านการบริหาร ความเป็นผู้นำ และจูงใจพนักงานให้ปฏิบัติงานเป็นไปตามมาตรฐานที่กำหนดไว้ สามารถ พูด อ่าน เขียน ภาษาอังกฤษได้ดี สามารถใช้โปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์ได้ดี MS Office

Job_Title: Customer Experience Specialist – Korean & English Speaking (based in Bangkok)
Job_Description: 지원자격 ㆍ필수사항 : 한국어 (Fluent Level-Topik 6 이상 혹은 동등한 레벨) : 영어 (Business Level-TOEIC 850점이상 혹은 동등한 레벨) ㆍ 4년제 학사학위 이상 + 풀타임 정규직 업무경력 1년 이상 ㆍ아고다의 최대부서(CEG：Customer Experience Group) 소속의 신입/경력 포지션 ㆍ비대면 고객 상담직(전화, 이메일, 실시간 채팅 응대) ㆍ고객 및 제휴 여행사의 문의사항에 대한 솔루션을 능동적으로 제안 ㆍ전화, 이메일 및 실시간 채팅을 통하여 고객 및 비즈니스 파트너에 서비스 제공 ㆍ회사가 추구하는 고객서비스 방향을 이해하고 고객 지원 서비스 제공 ㆍ입사 후 한국 서울에서 진행되는 트레이닝에 참석 가능자(서울 거주기간은 약 10주~12주) ㆍ쉬프트(스케줄) 근무 가능자 ㆍ남성의 경우 병역필 또는 면제자 ㆍ해외여행에 결격사유가 없는 자 근무조건 ㆍHybrid (재택근무 병행) System: 8주 Cycle (7주 재택 + 1주 출근) - 입사 4개월차부터 가능 ㆍ근무지 : 태국 방콕 ㆍRelocation Support 지원 ( 편도항공권, 임시숙소, 비자지원) ㆍ근무시간 : 스케쥴(Shift) 근무제 – 오전7시~오후8시 중 연속 9시간 스케쥴 근무 (실제업무시간7.5시간 + 휴식1.5시간) 주 5일 근무 연속 2일 휴무 ㆍ급여 : 업계 최고 대우+ 연 1회 성과 보너스 ㆍ급여 및 복리후생은 고용형태와 관련없이 입사 시부터 정사원기준으로 제공 복리후생 ㆍAgoda Choice(현금성복지포인트) ㆍ장기근속 휴가비 지원 및 포상휴가(최대 USD 2000, 10days) ㆍRemote Working Program ㆍ재택근무수당(USD 400, 1회) ㆍ그 외 : 직원할인, 건강검진제공 등 e Opportunity: If you are looking for a rewarding and exciting career in customer service, we want you! We are currently looking to recruit Customer Support Specialists to be based in our Bangkok office. This is a fantastic opportunity to develop your customer service skills while working for a fast-paced company that invests in its employees. If you are fluent in Korean, we would love to hear from you! What you’ll Need to Succeed: We are looking for individuals that have Fluent level of Korean & business level of English . In this role, We're handling Korean customers. Immaculate telephone manners and communication skills. Excellent listening skills, critical-thinker with attention to detail. Minimum typing speed of 35 words per minute Willing to work rotating shifts Ability to work in both a team environment and autonomously Demonstrate high degree of integrity and confidentiality In this Role, you’ll get to: You will deliver excellent customer service and manage the needs of our customers (guests and partners) through our communication channels (phone and email). Professionally handle high volume of inquiries from clients and customers. You will be accountable for meeting individual (KPIs) and team goals. Understand and deliver business strategies and improve customer services through the execution of self-service. Continuously identify work process improvements. Communicate to Team Leaders and (or) Manager. Perform office-based administrative duties whenever required. Must demonstrate high degree of integrity and confidentiality – Maintain confidentiality of customer information at all times. Take ownership of issues and concerns of customers, including operational issues, pricing / invoice queries etc. Relocation/ visa support will be provided. Also, If you passed final hiring stage in this position, you'll have to do training in Korea for about 3 months.

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in any fields Good product and destination knowledge of Thailand are advantageous Managing allotments and handling allotment control Very good command of spoken and written English Microsoft Office knowledge Experience with any Travel Agent booking system is advantageous Experience to communicate and to work with foreign nationals Flexible and fast adaptation to new tasks Active team player and leadership personality Interested applicants shall send their curriculum vitae indicating their work experience, a recent photograph and the present and expected salary by APPLY NOW; Go Vacation Thailand Khun Nicha Minkhuntod / Senior Manager HR and Administration 152, Chartered Square Building, 25th Floor, North Sathorn Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 Tel. (66) 2 267 1202-4, Fax. (66) 2 267 1128 Website : www.go-vacation.com

Company: Royal Orchid Hotel (Thailand) Public Company Limited
Job_Description: JOB SUMMARY Functions as the strategic business leader of the property's Rooms department. Responsible for planning, developing, implementing and evaluating the quality of property’s rooms. Position works with direct reports to develop and implement departmental strategies and ensures implementation of the brand service strategy and brand initiatives. The position ensures Rooms operations meet the brand’s standards, targets customer needs, ensures employee satisfaction, focuses on growing revenues and maximizes the financial performance of the department. Develops and implements property-wide strategies that deliver products and services to meet or exceed the needs and expectations of the brand’s target customer and employees and provides a return on investment to the owner and company. CANDIDATE PROFILE Education and Experience • 2-year degree from an accredited university in Business Administration, Hotel and Restaurant Management, or related major; 4 years experience in the guest services, front desk, housekeeping, sales and marketing, management operations, or related professional area. OR • 4-year bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Hotel and Restaurant Management, or related major; 2 years experience in the guest services, front desk, housekeeping, sales and marketing, management operations, or related professional area. CORE WORK ACTIVITIES Leading Rooms Team • Champions the brand’s service vision for product and service delivery. • Communicates a clear and consistent message regarding departmental goals to produce desired results. • Makes and executes the necessary decisions to keep property moving forward toward achievement of goals. • Monitors and promotes room rates, specials, and promotions at the residence. Managing Profitability • Analyzes service issues and identifies trends. • Works with Rooms team to develop an operational strategy that is aligned with the brand’s business strategy and leads its execution. • Reviews and audits expenses. Managing Revenue Goals • Monitors Rooms operations sales performance against budget. • Reviews reports and financial statements to determine Rooms operations performance against budget. • Coaches and supports operations team to effectively manage occupancy and rate, wages and controllable expenses. • Compares budgeted wages to actual wages, coaching direct reports to address problem areas and holding team accountable for results. Ensuring and Providing Exceptional Customer Service • Demonstrates and communicates key drivers of guest satisfaction for the brand’s target customer. • Delivers excellent customer service throughout the customer experience and encourages the same from other employees. • Reviews guest feedback with leadership team and ensures appropriate corrective action is taken. • Coordinates and communicates event details both verbally and in writing to the customer and property operations. • Creates an atmosphere in all Rooms areas that meets or exceeds guest expectations. • Responds to and handles guest problems and complaints. • Uses personal judgment and expertise to enhance the customer experience. • Stays available to solve problems and/or suggest alternatives to previous arrangements. • Interacts with guests to obtain feedback on product quality and service levels. • Stays visible and interfaces with customers on a regular basis to obtain feedback on quality of product, service levels and overall satisfaction. • Works to continually improve customer service by integrating obtained feedback and personal judgment into action plans. • Emphasizes guest satisfaction during all departmental meetings and focuses on continuous improvement. • Ensures that employees understand expectations and parameters for Room duties. • Facilitates the development of creative solutions to overcome obstacles and ensures implementation to continually improve guest satisfaction results. Managing and Conducting Human Resources Activities • Interviews and hires employees. • Ensures employees are treated fairly and equitably. • Ensures that regular, ongoing communication is happening in Rooms (e.g., pre-shift briefings, staff meetings). • Fosters employee commitment to providing excellent service, participates in daily stand-up meetings and models desired service behaviors in all interactions with guests and employees. • Incorporates guest satisfaction as a component of staff/operations meetings with an emphasis on generating innovative ways to continually improve results. • Sets goals and expectations for direct reports using the performance review process and holds staff accountable for successful performance. • Solicits employee feedback, utilizes an “open door policy” and reviews employee satisfaction results to identify and address employee problems or concerns. • Ensures property policies are administered fairly and consistently, disciplinary procedures and documentation are completed according to Standard and Local Operating Procedures (SOPs and LSOPs) and supports the Peer Review Process. • Conducts annual performance appraisal with direct reports according to Standard Operating Procedures. • Champions change, ensures brand and regional business initiatives are implemented and communicates follow-up actions to team as necessary. • Identifies talents of direct reports and their teams, and assists with their growth and development plans.

Key Responsibilities Ensure smooth day-to-day operations and optimize resources for guest satisfaction. Oversee staff recruitment, training, and schedules to maintain high service standards. Implement measures for luxury standards, inspections, and continuous improvement. Optimize costs without compromising service quality in operational budgets. Foster exceptional guest experiences by maintaining service standards and addressing concerns promptly. Adhere to health and safety regulations, implement emergency protocols, and ensure a secure environment. Good command in ENGLISH both speaking and written Location Chonburi Benefits Floating service charge Working on Monday – Friday Day off-birthday and birthday gift Public holiday 15 days Annual leave 8 - 15 days (depending on years of service) 2 duty meals per day Officer Check (OC) benefits Group Insurance Social Security benefits Annual check up Uniform and laundry service Staff New Year party and other activities **If you are interested in this position you can reach me at (+66) 093-380-9666 Khun Phawadee(May)**

Get to Know our Team: Agoda’s Customer Support Team understands that travel can be an ever-changing environment. That is why we provide in-person, real-time help around the clock and in 38 languages. No matter the issue, we present the best of Agoda’s values to each and every customer with multiple support channels and a strong desire to serve. Certainly doing more than answering phone calls or replying to emails, our specialists actively look for ways to improve our customer’s experience. We quickly adapt to challenges by collaborating with other teams and experimenting on everything we can. This has allowed us to develop new and effective products that produce meaningful results and continue to drive Agoda’s business performance. Our Customer Support Team serves a daily role in contributing to core strength and service of Agoda with a clear vision and a focus on efficient and satisfying customer support. The Opportunity: A Customer Experience Specialist is expected to champion customer satisfaction by demonstrating the highest level of professionalism, listening and engaging with the customer, and providing an individualized solution that suits their needs. For you to be successful, you should enjoy the challenge of problem-solving and welcome the opportunity to find solutions in collaboration with our business partners. You must have a strong ability to adapt to change, embrace ambiguity and contribute to an environment of shared learning and feedback. In this Role, you’ll get to: Deliver excellent customer service and manage the needs of our customers (guests and partners) through our communication channels (phone, email, and live chat) Understand and deliver business strategies and improve customer services through the execution of self-service Accountable for meeting individual (KPIs) and team goals Continuously identify work process improvements and communicate to Team Leaders and (or) Manager What you’ll Need to Succeed: MUST have a good command of spoken and written ENGLISH language and be a Native Thai. Immaculate telephone manners and communication skills. Excellent listening skills, critical-thinker with attention to detail. Minimum typing speed of 35 words per minute. Toeic score 700 and above Willing to work on rotating shifts (8:00 AM – 11:00 PM including weekends and public holidays) Ability to work in both a team environment and autonomously. Demonstrate a high degree of integrity and confidentiality. It’s Great if you have: At least 1 year of working experience in the related field would be desirable although fresh graduates are welcomed to apply. Apply now: https://grnh.se/aa8490121us [link removed]

Job_Title: Director of Villa/ผู้อำนวยการส่วนงานบ้านพักวิลลา
Job_Description: JOB RESPONSIBILITIES ; 1.  Understand the financial goals of the property and make sure the property meets those goals; understand his/her responsibility for managing the company assets and the budget. 2.  Maintain strong resident and customer relations, ensuring we provide them with high end service standards. 3.  Oversee the leasing of villas long/short term, ensuring the occupancy rates are in line with the budget. 4.  Develop a competitive budget and marketing plan with the GM. 5.  Oversee the housekeeping and Spa departments. Implementing schedules and efficient working practices. 6.  Supervise resident relations by making sure employees follow company values and SOP’s. 7.  Develop a hard working engaged team and provide training opportunities for the staff. 8.  Have solid working relationships with other departments, have open communication with other HOD’s. 9.  Create monthly occupancy charts for the Housekeeping and engineer departments to schedule their staff. 10.  Other duties may be assigned from time to time, but prior notice will be given. Skills and Qualifications ; You shall possess the following core skills and qualifications; Positive attitude and work ethic Clear communication skills are required, along with administrative ability to schedule workloads and rosters A minimum of 5 years in property management and strong attention to detail are also necessary. A strong understanding of both written and spoken English. Bachelor’s Degree in related field Teamwork and strong leadership skills

Responsibilities: Manage full financial of P&L accountability i.e. forecasting, actual sales, cost analysis, budgeting. Manage overall costs including equipment efficiencies, waste, direct labor and materials. Develop and implement procedures, control systems for maintaining hygiene and quality standards. Manage all F&B and day-to-day operations within budgeted guidelines and to the highest standards. Preserve excellent levels of internal and external customer service. Design exceptional menus, purchase goods and continuously make necessary improvements. Identify customers needs and respond proactively to all of their concerns. Lead F&B team by attracting, recruiting, training and appraising talented personnel. People Management, continuous Training of employees . Establish targets, KPI's, schedules, policies and procedures. Provide a two way communication and nurture an ownership environment with emphasis in motivation and teamwork. Comply with all health and safety regulations. Qualifications: At least 10 years experience in Food and Beverage Strong communication, service and leadership skill Good command in English both speaking and writing Regular work in the resturant Grande Centre Point Pattaya Hotel

Job_Title: Executive Housekeeper/หัวหน้าแม่บ้าน
Job_Description: ควบคุมการปฏิบัติงานของแม่บ้าน พนักงานทำห้องพัก พนักงานทำความสะอาดทั่วไป และเสมียนแม่บ้าน กำหนดมาตรฐานความสะอาดและการจัดเตรียมห้องพักให้พนักงานถือเป็นหลักปฏิบัติตามที่ฝ่ายบริหารกำหนด รวมทั้ง กฎเกณฑ์และระเบียบในการทำงานเพื่อให้งานทุกอย่างในแผนบรรลุถึงมาตรฐานที่ได้วางไว้ จัดตารางการทำงานของพนักงานให้เหมาะสมและสมดุลกับงาน ตรวจพื้นที่รับผิดชอบเป็นประจำ เพื่อดูแลให้งานด้านแม่บ้านเป็นไปตามมาตรฐานที่กำหนด รับผิดชอบในเรื่องรายการของใช้ และการสั่งของเข้ามาทดแทน ใหม่เมื่อรายการของใช้ต่าง ๆใกล้จะหมดลง ประสานงานกับร้านซักรีดและแผนกช่างเป็นประจำเพื่อความสะดวกในการเบิกจ่ายผ้าประเภทต่างๆ ที่ใช้ภายในห้องพัก และให้งานซ่อมแซมเป็นไปอย่างราบรื่นและห้องพร้อมขายอยู่เสมอ ประสานงานอย่างใกล้ชิดกับแผนกบริการส่วนหน้าในเรื่องลูกค้า เข้าพักและการออกไปของลูกค้าโดยเฉพาะ งานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ งานในแผนกแม่บ้าน อื่น ๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย สวัสดิการ หอพักพนักงาน ยูนิฟอร์ม วันหยุดพักร้อน วันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ 16 วัน วันหยุด 6 วันต่อเดือน เซอร์วิสชาร์จ

Job_Title: พนักงานต้อนรับ GSA
Job_Description: โรงแรม 4 ดาว หางดง เชียงใหม่ - Content Villa Chiang Mai รายละเอียดงาน ต้อนรับลูกค้า ให้ข้อมูลที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการบริการและเรื่องที่เกี่ยวข้องอื่นๆ ให้บริการ Check-In/ Out จัดทำเอกสาร งานในระบบ และกระบวนการที่เกี่ยวข้อง ทำรายงาน สรุปข้อมูล ส่งต่อข้อมูลลูกค้าและการเข้าพัก ทำบิล และส่งยอดบิล) ประสานงานกับส่วนงานที่เกี่ยวข้องและปฏิบัติงานที่จำเป็นต่างๆ เพื่อให้การบริการสำเร็จลุล่วง รับจองห้องพัก และบริการต่างๆ คุณสมบัติของผู้สมัคร (วุฒิการศึกษา/ประสบการณ์ทำงาน) มีประสบการการทำงานมาก่อน สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ดี มีบุคลิก มนุษยสัมพันธ์ และมีการตัดสินใจที่ดี สวัสดิการต่างๆ service charge ชุดฟอร์มในการทำงาน 3 ชุด วันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ วันหยุดประจำปี ประกันสังคม

Job Summary: The Deputy Operations Director/Director reports to COO and will plays a critical role in overseeing and optimizing the day-to-day operations of the company. This leadership position is responsible for managing various operational functions, ensuring efficiency, and contributing to the organization's overall success. Key Responsibilities: Strategic Planning : Develop and execute operations strategies aligned with the company's goals and objectives. Monitor and adapt strategies to meet changing business needs. Team Leadership : Lead and motivate a diverse team of managers and staff across different operational areas, such as logistics, supply chain, production, and customer service. Process Improvement : Continuously assess and improve operational processes to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance quality and service delivery. Resource Allocation : Manage and optimize resource allocation, including budget planning and allocation of human resources and equipment, to ensure operational goals are met. Compliance and Quality Control : Ensure that all operations comply with relevant regulations, industry standards, and quality control measures. Supply Chain Management : Oversee supply chain functions, including procurement, vendor management, inventory control, and distribution to maintain a seamless flow of goods and materials. Performance Metrics : Develop and implement key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to evaluate operational performance and provide regular reports to the executive team. Risk Management : Identify operational risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize potential disruptions and financial losses. Vendor and Partner Relationships : Cultivate and manage relationships with key vendors, suppliers, and business partners to secure favorable terms and maintain strong partnerships. Strategic Collaboration : Collaborate with other departments, such as finance, sales, and marketing, to ensure cross-functional alignment and support company-wide goals. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field; an MBA or similar advanced degree is a plus. At least 20 years of experience in manufacturing industry Proven experience in operations management, with at least 10 years of leadership experience. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Proficiency in project management, strategic planning and operations software. Knowledge of industry best practices and emerging trends. Ability to adapt to a dynamic and fast-paced work environment. Personal Characteristics: Exceptional leadership skills, with a track record of inspiring and leading high-performing teams. Visionary thinker with the ability to formulate and execute strategic plans. Strong organizational and multitasking abilities. Detail-oriented and results-driven. Calm under pressure with the ability to make sound decisions in critical situations.

Job_Description: Job Description: Set operation process for new store opening Achieve P&L target of the outlets Maintain high quality of food and restaurants by ensuring compliance with all operations procedures/standard Ensure that all branches under his /her supervision are able to achieve QSC objectives as per planned by reviewing & Monitoring Labor planning, scheduling and utilization Enforce & support all training & development plans for all staffs under his/her supervision as per company’s policy Monitor Labor by analyzing store reports, labor scheduling, Labor productivity Plan and optimize supplies, utilities and all outlet costs/expenses Coordinate with marketing department to implement marketing campaign and new products to meet brand’s objectives Qualifications: Bachelor degree or higher level, any related field Preferably at least 3 years+ of experience as an operations manager, or 5 years+ as an area manager in restaurant business or similar Knowledgeable in computers and financial flow through of the restaurant or retails Competent to be a team leader, react quickly and work well under pressure, tactful and sensitive to employee needs Positive role model, possess good interpersonal, customer service, communication and organizational skills Professional level in reading and writing English in work Benefits and benefits: Social Security / Workmen's Compensation Fund Service Charge Other Extra Allowance Annual bonus 2 times / year Annual salary adjustment Provident Fund Annual Health Check Medical Expenses (OPD/IPD) Travel Expenses Training and development of internal and external personnel Annual Party / Annual Events Food and Snacks Subvention in various cases Gift Voucher 1,500 Baht/Month and discount 20 % every dinning Work 6 days per week, Extra holidays, Annual Leave Vacation days Contact Person: Tel. 091 923 5539, 096 740 6428 (K. Wa - HR) Line ID. magurohr Website: www.maguro.co.th [link removed] Facebook: Maguro [link removed]

A bit about us: Crafted ethically in Chiang Mai, Color of Heat’s designs reflect multi-functional versatility and embrace comfort and wearability. Our unisex, size-inclusive clothing comes with a lifetime warranty, repairs, and a recycling program, ensuring used items find new life. At Color of Heat, we are pioneers in adopting a closed-loop philosophy, transforming cutting and sewing scraps into our 'reHeat' line. Our commitment to sustainability is evident in every thread, as we minimize waste and add unique charm to our products. Join us in reshaping the fashion industry—where style meets sustainability. Responsibilities: (Note: These will be part of job training during the initial months, so it's okay if you're unfamiliar with these tasks.) Oversee In-Progress Production: Maintain production schedules, manage quality control, and progress alignment Communications Between Teams: Communicate with producers and suppliers in person, phone, WhatsApp, and email on daily operations Sourcing New Materials and Fabric: Order and coordinate delivery of materials Creative Skills: Assist, coordinate, and participate in product photoshoots Content Creation: Develop, organize, and schedule engaging content for social media platforms (reels/short videos + static posts) Requirements: Native Thai Proficient in English Located in Chiang Mai Able to drive a motorbike or car Organized and communicative Attention to details Eagerness to learn about clothing production Ability to learn + use computer programs with ease Editing skills for photography and videography (Photoshop, Lightroom, iMovie) College degree or other relevant certificates is a plus What makes us special: Open culture & close-knit team: With 2-3 core employees, you'll experience the closeness + support from our friendly work environment. Your contributions will be valued and impactful. Slow Fashion Impact: Join a slow fashion brand dedicated to minimizing environmental impact and promoting sustainable practices. Room for Growth: Opportunities for personal + professional development, as a small business we emphasize nurturing talent and providing opportunities for individuals to expand their roles. What We Offer: Hybrid Work: Possibility for remote days or periods depending on work demands throughout the year. Paid Vacation: 17 Public Holidays per year, with an additional 6 paid vacation days + 4 paid sick days. Office & Perks: Multicultural teamwork, friendly work environment, and FREE coffee. Team Building: Team dinners and all-expense paid yearly weekend retreats. Financial Security Development: Savings plan program with matched savings each month. The salary for this position ranges between 15,000-25,000, dependent on the candidate's experience, skills, and qualifications. We are excited to welcome passionate individuals who share our values and vision for a sustainable future in the fashion industry. If you are ready to make a difference, apply today! Please email us your resume and letter of motivation! P.S. If this position speaks to you but you are a student or feel you are not a qualified candidate, do not hesitate to reach out, we are looking for interns as well. For university students interested in becoming an intern, we can provide the opportunity to earn university credits.

Job_Title: Reservations Specialist/ผู้มีประสบการณ้ด้านการสำรองห้องพักกับโรงแรม ทัวร์...
Job_Description: The Reservations Team is responsible for bookings after the Sales Team has finished confirming all services and their prices with our customers. The Reservations Team is responsible for the timely and accurate reservation of our customers’ services. The Reservations Team’s responsibility ends after all possible reservations are confirmed by our partners and responsibility is handed over to the Quality Team. Responsibilities The day-to-day responsibilities of the Reservations Team follows a detail-oriented process to ensure that customers receive the services they have purchased at the correct time and for the correct price. Once the Sales Team notifies the Reservations Team that a booking has been confirmed, the Reservations Team: Inserts all services into the Tourplan booking system, paying special attention to match the Sales Team’s quote sheet prices for each service. Contacts each partner to confirm each service at the agreed upon time and cost, updating the Tourplan booking accordingly. Adds any additional customer information that may be required by our partners to provide their services. Adds pick-up and drop-off information as required by our partners and customers. Flags any services in the Tourplan booking that cannot be confirmed for follow-up by the Quality Team. Cross-checks the booking in Tourplan against the Sales Team‘s quote. Issues service vouchers for the Sales Team to send to our customers. Desired Qualifications Basic knowledge of Microsoft Excel, Word, Planner, and Outlook. Proficiency in reading, writing, and speaking English. Prior experience in tour reservations preferred. Prior experience with Tourplan software preferred. Team-oriented attitude and attention to detail.

Outbound Operation Team Lead Location : Samutprakarn Salary: Up to THB 70,000 As the Outbound Operation Team Lead, you will be responsible for overseeing and managing the outbound operations of our retail business, specifically focusing on Order Administration, Pick-Pack, and Transport. You will lead a team focused on efficiently handling the movement of goods and ensuring timely delivery to customers. Your role involves supervising team members, optimizing processes, and maintaining high standards of quality and accuracy in outbound operations. Responsibilities: Lead and supervise a team of outbound operation associates, providing guidance, support, and training to ensure their effectiveness and productivity. Continuously review and enhance outbound processes related to Order Administration, Pick-Pack, and Transport to maximize efficiency, reduce errors, and meet/exceed performance metrics. Oversee the efficient handling of customer orders, ensuring accurate processing, documentation, and verification before fulfillment. Supervise the picking and packing process, ensuring accuracy, proper packaging, and preparation for shipment. Coordinate with logistics and transport partners to ensure timely and efficient delivery of outgoing products to customers. Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, such as customer service and logistics, to ensure smooth operations and resolve issues promptly. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Logistics, or a related field (or equivalent experience). Proven experience in outbound operations, specifically in Order Administration, Pick-Pack, and Transport, preferably in a retail or e-commerce environment, with a track record of leadership and team management. Effective communication and interpersonal abilities to lead and collaborate with diverse teams. Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

Responsible for overseeing wine stock take Others Prepare monthly commissions/incentives/petty cash reports Look for new sales development business opportunities Report to Retail Head - Thailand

Job_Title: SEA Savoury Culinary and Technical Chef
Job_Description: Job Title : SEA Savoury Culinary and Technical Chef (Yearly Contact with permanent position after one year) Job Purpose: Culinary and innovation chef will deliver culinary expertise and guidance to R&D team as well as to our clients. Chef will develop product recipes allowing promotion of MANE flavours and technologies. Chef will take part in savoury development pipeline and will provide service to our customers. Job Description : Work closely with R&D teams to develop products and share golden standard recipes/tastes. Create reactive/proactive menus, recipes, and dishes following customer requests. Understand and apply flavours, seasonings, and technological products into culinary applications. Evaluate performance and cost in use. Evaluate Application/Market products and give feedback. Participates in new product development and ideation sessions for proactive initiatives. Create culinary workshops for R&D and marketing team about specific culinary topics. Be involved with customer chef for developing product with MANE Solutions. Liaise with MANE chef network to share ideas, concepts, and experience. Monitors culinary trends (restaurants, markets etc.) to inspire new flavouring creations and innovative finished product concepts. Ensures MANE’s culinary image towards customers, including contribution to Communication initiatives (LinkedIn, Website, TASTE magazine etc) Contributes to the MANE’s culinary image during professional exhibitions, conferences, and fairs. Perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned. Qualification Bachelor’s degree from Culinary Arts 3-5 years culinary experience. (Experience with food industry would be considered) Understanding food industry and ingredients Extensive food knowledge and creativity Creative mindset that can be translated into tangible dishes or conceptual dishes. Ability to manage tasks and responsibilities, altogether with monitoring progress. Ability to be a lead of workshop and training program. Be able to communicate in Thai and English (speaking and writing) Strong presentation skills Strong sensory skills Up to date with culinary trends and optimized kitchen processes. Good understanding of useful computer programs (MS Office) V. Mane Fils  (Thailand) Co., Ltd. Ladkrabang Industrail Estate, General Zone Phase III, 284 Moo.4,Chalongkrung Road, Lamplathiew, Ladkrabang, Bangkok 10520 www.mane.com

Job_Title: Senior Sales Manager / Sales Manager - MICE
Company: Royal Orchid Hotel (Thailand) Public Company Limited
Job_Description: JOB SUMMARY Responsible for proactively soliciting and managing large group/catering related opportunities with significant revenue potential. Manages group/catering opportunities not handled by an Event Booking Center (EBC). Actively up-sells each business opportunity to maximize revenue opportunity. Achieves personal and team related revenue goals. Verifies business is turned over properly and in a timely fashion for proper service delivery. Responsible for driving customer/guest loyalty by delivering service excellence throughout each customer/guest experience. Provides service to customers in order to grow the account on behalf of the company. CANDIDATE PROFILE Education and Experience • High school diploma or GED; 2 years experience in the sales and marketing, guest services, front desk, or related professional area. OR • 2-year degree from an accredited university in Business Administration, Marketing, Hotel and Restaurant Management, or related major; no work experience required. CORE WORK ACTIVITIES Understanding Market Opportunities & Driving Revenue • Targets group/catering accounts, markets, or segments with heavy emphasis on proactive solicitation and account saturation. • Partners with group/catering counterpart to effectively manage the business opportunity. • Responds to incoming group/catering opportunities for the property that are outside parameters of the . • Handles all opportunities if property does not participate in an EBC. • Identifies, qualifies and solicits new group/catering business to achieve personal and each property’s revenue goals. • Focuses efforts on group/catering accounts with significant potential sales revenue. • Develops effective group/catering sales plans and actions. • Designs, develops and sells creative catered events. • Maximizes revenue by upselling packages and creative food and beverage. • Understands the overall market - competitors’ strengths and weaknesses, economic trends, supply and demand etc. and knows how to sell against them. • Closes the best opportunities for each property based on market conditions and individual property needs. • Uses negotiating skills and creative selling abilities to close on business and negotiate contracts. Providing Exceptional Customer Service • Handles complex business with significant revenue potential as well as significant customer expectations. • Builds and strengthens relationships with existing and new customers to enable future bookings. Activities include sales calls, entertainment, FAM trips, trade shows, etc. • Develops relationships within community to strengthen and expand customer base for group/catering sales opportunities. • Supports brand’s Service and Relationship Strategy, driving customer loyalty by delivering service excellence throughout each customer experience. • Provides excellent customer service in order to grow share of the account. • Executes brand’s Customer Service Standards and property’s Brand Standards. • Executes and supports the business Customer Service Standards and property’s Brand Standards. • Participates in and practices daily service basics of the brand. • Executes exemplary customer service to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty by assisting the customer and ensuring their satisfaction before and during their program/event. • Serves the customer by understanding their needs and recommending the appropriate features and services that best meet their needs and exceed their expectations, while building a relationship and loyalty to the property and brand. • Gains understanding of the property’s primary target customer and service expectations; serves the customer by understanding their business, business issues and concerns, to offer better business solution both prior to, and during the program/event. Building Successful Relationships • Works collaboratively with off-property sales channels (e.g., , Market Sales, Strategic Accounts) to ensure sales efforts are coordinated, complementary and not duplicative. • Manages and develops relationships with key internal and external stakeholders. • Uses sales resources and administrative/support staff. Additional Responsibilities • Utilizes intranet for resources and information. • Conducts site inspections. • Creates contracts as required. • Executes and supports the operational aspects of business booked (e.g., generating proposal, writing contract, customer correspondence).

Job_Title: General Manager/ผู้จัดการทั่วไป
Job_Description: About Flame Dining Club: Flame Dining Club is a high-end club and restaurant that offers an exceptional dining and entertainment experience for its members. The venue provides an upscale and exclusive environment where members can enjoy gourmet dining, social gatherings, and special events. Responsibilities: 1. Leadership and Team Management: Provide leadership and direction to all department heads and staff members. Recruit, train, and manage a high-performing team to ensure exceptional service delivery. Foster a positive and collaborative work environment to promote team engagement and high morale. Set clear performance standards and provide ongoing feedback to ensure continuous improvement. 2. Operations Management: Oversee all aspects of club operations, including food and beverage, events, and member services. Develop and implement standard operating procedures to ensure seamless and efficient operations. Monitor inventory levels, supply costs, and vendor relationships to ensure cost-effective purchasing and inventory management. Maintain high standards of cleanliness, maintenance, and safety throughout the club and restaurant. 3. Guest Experience and Member Relations: Develop and maintain strong relationships with club members to understand their needs and preferences. Constantly seek opportunities to enhance the member experience through personalized service and attention to detail. Proactively address member feedback and concerns to ensure overall satisfaction and loyalty. Plan and execute exclusive member events and special dining experiences to drive member engagement and retention. 4. Financial Management: Develop and manage the club's annual operating budget with a focus on revenue growth and cost control. Analyze financial performance metrics and make data-driven decisions to enhance profitability. Implement sales and marketing initiatives to drive membership growth and increase revenue streams. Monitor and control expenses while maximizing the value delivered to members. 5. Regulatory Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure compliance with all local, state, and federal regulations related to food and beverage operations, health and safety standards, and labor laws. Mitigate operational risks by implementing and enforcing best practices in security, safety, and emergency preparedness. Keep abreast of industry trends and changes in regulations to maintain the club's competitive edge and mitigate legal risk. Qualifications: Proven leadership experience in the hospitality industry, preferably in a high-end club or restaurant environment. Strong business acumen with a track record of driving revenue growth and delivering financial results. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to build strong relationships with members, guests, and staff. Adept at fostering a culture of service excellence and continuous improvement. Sound knowledge of food and beverage operations, customer service best practices, and industry trends. Demonstrated ability to manage multiple priorities and solve complex operational challenges. Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred. Foreigner or Local/Asian Working at Flame Dining Club: Flame Dining Club offers a dynamic and rewarding work environment for individuals who are passionate about delivering exceptional hospitality experiences. As part of our team, you will have the opportunity to work in a collaborative and upscale setting, engaging with a diverse and discerning membership base. We offer competitive compensation and benefits, including opportunities for professional development and career growth within our organization. If you have a proven track record of leadership in the hospitality industry and thrive in a fast-paced, high-service environment, we invite you to apply for the General Manager position at Flame Dining Club.

Company: Siam Makro Public Company Limited (Head Office)
Job_Description: Job description : A Master Baker, or Pastry Chef, is in charge of preparing baked goods for sale to customers. Their duties include creating recipes, ordering ingredients and coordinating baking schedules to produce breads, cakes, pastries, pies, cookies and other goods. Responsibilities : 1.Identifies suppliers who can co-develop products. 2.Assess the quality of raw materials before baking to ensure conformance to set standards 3.Ensure profitability by maintaining an accurate record of baking operations. 4.Direct and supervise the production staff’s activities to make sure that products are up to standards. 5.Decorate baked products using glaze, icing and other toppings to achieve a finished appearance. 6.Assess the quality of raw materials before baking. 7.Maintain good knowledge of complex industrial mixing machine and how to operate them 8.Conduct research to develop original recipes for baked products 9.Direct and supervise the activities of production staff to ensure products are up to standard 10.Ensure proper storage of baking utensils and supplies 11.Train new recruits on baking techniques and procedures 12.Manage inventory levels and order supplies before they are used up Qualifications : 1.Experience with cake decoration techniques and have expertise as a Baker. 2.Familiar with professional kitchen equipment, such as dough sheeters, blenders and mixers. 3.Should have basic math, technological and practical skills. The right candidate will typically possess time management, communication, organizational and resource management skills 4.At least a high school diploma and have trained at technical or culinary schools tend to be at a competitive advantage. 5.Detail-oriented 6.Flexibility to work around customer demand 7.Ability to work with team members to solve problems 8.Good planning skills 9.Ability to develop new recipes
